scripts.install:deps: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf ./packages/*/node_modules && npm install --registry=http://registry.npm.taobao.org && lerna exec -- npm install --registry=http://registry.npm.taobao.org
scripts.tnpm:install:deps: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf ./packages/*/node_modules && tnpm i && lerna exec -- tnpm i
scripts.ci: npm run install:deps && npm run packages:build && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run coverage
